name: fribidi

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
GNU FriBidi: The Free Implementation of the Unicode Bidirectional
Algorithm.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependent_to.name: pango
dependent_to.description:
Pango is a library for laying out and rendering of text, with an
emphasis on internationalization. It can be used anywhere that text
layout is needed, though most of the work on Pango so far has been done
in the context of the GTK+ widget toolkit.

dependent_to.name: r-textshaping
dependent_to.description:
Bindings to the 'HarfBuzz' and 'Fribidi' Libraries for Text Shaping.
Provides access to the text shaping functionality in the 'HarfBuzz'
library and the bidirectional algorithm in the 'Fribidi' library.
'textshaping' is a low-level utility package mainly for graphic devices
that expands upon the font tool-set provided by the 'systemfonts'
package.

dependent_to.name: ffmpeg
dependent_to.description:
FFmpeg is a complete, cross-platform solution to record, convert and
stream audio and video.

dependent_to.name: libraqm
dependent_to.description: Raqm provides a convenient API for the logic of complex text layout.

dependent_to.name: gtkplus
dependent_to.description:
The GTK+ package contains libraries used for creating graphical user
interfaces for applications.
